content: An interesting thing happened in this artifact comparison. It shows a few regressions despite the changes not really being something one would expect to lead to perf changes. In the next run those regressions get reversed. Clearly this was a blip. I wonder how often these occur...
charts for artifact sizes would help there
to get a sense of how much noise there is
When I say "artifact comparison" I mean comparing rustc artifacts (of which incremental compilation artifact size comparison is only a small part). Perhaps we're talking about different things?
Oh yeah, I meant the on disk sizes
